```py

                      command=radCall)

                      command=radCall)

                      command=radCall)
```

```py

rad2.grid(column=1, row=5, sticky=tk.W, columnspan=3)
rad3.grid(column=2, row=5, sticky=tk.W, columnspan=3)
```
